definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
broad and open road (idiom); fig. brilliant future prospects
(lit.) the road through Yangguan 陽關|阳关[Yang2 guan1]/(fig.) wide open road/bright future
see 林陰大道|林阴大道[lin2 yin1 da4 dao4]

sentences.english: Other violence occurred at Friendship Road and at Liberation Road, they said.
sentences.chinese: 他們說還有其它的暴力事件發生在友誼路和解放大道。

sentences.english: Metro line 2 to century avenue Station, about 10 min walk to the hostel.
sentences.chinese: 坐地鐵2號線世紀大道站下，步行10分鐘到旅舍。

sentences.english: The roads and aqueducts of Rome have been the admiration of all after ages.
sentences.chinese: 古羅馬的大道和高架渠在其後的年代一直受到羨慕。

sentences.english: Francis hotel is located in Guangzhou City, 501 Avenue Sanyuanli.
sentences.chinese: 伍福酒店位於廣州市三元里大道501號。

sentences.english: Phillips Park was bordered by Pelee Boulevard and Elmhurst.
sentences.chinese: 菲力浦公園的兩邊是比利大道及艾爾姆霍斯特大街。

sentences.english: Can you tell us what Portobello Road is famous for?
sentences.chinese: 你能告訴我們波託貝洛大道是因什麼而出名的嗎？

sentences.english: Lujiazui Area also has Ocean Aquarium and Riverside Promenade, etc.
sentences.chinese: 陸家嘴區域還包含海洋水族館，濱江大道等。

sentences.english: Traffic encircles the Angel of Independence monument on Mexico City’s Paseo de la Reforma.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥城改革大道，車輛環繞獨立天使紀念碑行駛。

sentences.english: The dinner took place at the Hotel Majestic, 19 Avenue Kléber, in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 晚宴在巴黎克萊貝爾大道19號的宏偉酒店內舉行。

sentences.english: And I will make all my mountains a way, and my highways shall be exalted.
sentences.chinese: 我必使我的衆山成爲大道，我的大路也被修高。

sentences.english: In fact, each of the road leading to the sun, are full of frustrations.
sentences.chinese: 繅其實每一條都通往陽光的大道，都充滿坎坷。

sentences.english: Out to a sleepy Flatbush Avenue.
sentences.chinese: 出來到了寂靜的弗拉特布什大道。

sentences.english: Obedience is the aim of supporting parents. No why and no reason to speak of.
sentences.chinese: 養親旨在順意，不問爲什麼，也不能講什麼大道理。

sentences.english: Fifth Avenue walks near New York's Central Park.
sentences.chinese: 一名男子在紐約中央公園附近的第五大道散步溜狗。

sentences.english: A rebuilt railcar has been displayed in a corner of Tai-Yuan Road and Civic Blvd. , Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 展示於臺北市太原路市民大道口的復古汽油車。

definition: abbr. for 立體交叉|立体交叉[li4 ti3 jiao1 cha1] overpass
